name: Fireball
description: A ball of fire that causes burn damage over time.

name: Shield Block
description: Blocks incoming damage with a shield.

name: Ice Shard
description: A shard of ice that slows down the enemy.

name: Magic Barrier
description: Creates a barrier that absorbs magic damage.

name: Thunder Strike
description: A strike of lightning that stuns the enemy.

name: Healing Aura
description: Heals over time in a small area.

name: Poison Spit
description: A poisonous attack that causes damage over time.

name: Defensive Stance
description: Reduces damage taken by hardening skin.

name: Earthquake
description: A powerful tremor that damages all nearby enemies.

name: Wind Barrier
description: A barrier of wind that deflects attacks.
